Pre-Game Insights: The Braves take on the Twins after Whit Merrifield's five-hit game on Monday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The matchup Tuesday is the second time these teams match up this season.
Minnesota is 37-27 at home and 72-59 overall.
Atlanta is 35-32 on the road and 71-60 overall.
The Braves have a 44-12 record in games when they did not give up a home run.
Minnesota has hit 162 total home runs to rank seventh in the majors.
Marcell Ozuna leads the Braves with 37 home runs while slugging.583.
Merrifield is 14-for-36 with three doubles, a triple, a home run and an RBI over the last 10 games.
Others: The Twins have a 4-6 record in their last 10 games with a.251 batting average and 4.09 ERA.
The Braves have a 7-3 record in their last 10 games with a.263 batting average and 2.50 ERA.
